Headline: Eastbound #120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express Temporary Reroute near Ogilvie Station
ShortDescription: Eastbound 120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express buses are temporarily rerouted near Ogilvie Station.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Randolph, Clinton, Washington, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Ogilvie Station.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: #112 Vincennes/111th buses are rerouted via 111th, Kedzie, 115th, Western and 111th, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Kedzie, 115th, Western and 111th, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie/California and #52A South Kedzie Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: #52 Kedzie/California and #52A South Kedzie buses are rerouted in both directions via 115th, Springfield, 115th, Western and 111th near 111th/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie/California and #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Springfield, 115th, Western, 111th, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.
